---
name: Conditional Edge Extraction
about: Extract conditional transitions in LangGraph
title: "[Phase-1] Extract conditional edges"
labels: control-flow, graph, phase-1
---

## Description
Extract conditional edges defined via `add_conditional_edges`.

## Requirements
- One edge per condition mapping
- Handle END as terminal transition

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Conditional edges extracted
- [ ] Conditions labeled correctly
